Package src

Class UserAuth

java.lang.Object
src.UserAuth
public class UserAuth extends Object
This class stores every required function for user authentication for logging into the system. Once user is successfully logged in, they will be directed to their respective main menu.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserAuth(Donor donor, NGO ngo, int type)
    This constructor is used for user authentication before being able to use the system.

    Method
    Description
    static int
    checkLogin(String username, String password, Donor donor, NGO ngo, int type)
    User's entered username and password is checked for validity and assigned to a "currentUser" object in the main file.
    static int
    loginAccount(Donor donor, NGO ngo, int type)
    Login page for user to log into their account.

      public UserAuth(Donor donor, NGO ngo, int type)
      This constructor is used for user authentication before being able to use the system.
      Parameters:
      donor - Donor object
      ngo - NGO object

  • Method Details

    • welcomePage

      public static int welcomePage(Donor donor, NGO ngo, int type)
      The welcome page. Users are able to log into their account or create a new account.
      Parameters:
      donor - Donor object
      ngo - NGO object
      type - User type value (0 = Donor, 1 = NGO)
      Returns:
      Returns the user type value to be used in the main file (AidSystem.java).

    • loginAccount

      public static int loginAccount(Donor donor, NGO ngo, int type)
      Login page for user to log into their account.
      Parameters:
      donor - Donor object
      ngo - NGO object
      type - User type (0 = Donor or 1 = NGO)
      Returns:
      Returns the usertype value to show either the Donor menu or NGO menu when successfully logged in.

    • checkLogin

      public static int checkLogin(String username, String password, Donor donor, NGO ngo, int type) throws IOException
      User's entered username and password is checked for validity and assigned to a "currentUser" object in the main file.
      Parameters:
      username - User's username
      password - User's password
      donor - A Donor object to be returned if the user is a Donor
      ngo - An NGO object to be returned if the user is an NGO
      type - User type (0 = Donor, 1 = NGO)
      Returns:
      Returns the usertype value to be used in loginAccount()
      Throws:
      IOException
